website_summaries.verdict: Great product made with E-Shield coating to prevent corrosion.
pros: Smooth surface finish that provides less pad break-in time
Comes with Vapor Corrosion Inhibitor (VCI) bag that reduces rotor prep and saves installation time
Safer stopping power with increased surface area to improve heat dissipation
Patented vane/rib design reduces rotor noise
cons: This product could use better quality control

customer_reviews.title: still fine after long use.
customer_reviews.text: great brakes in my truck. i bought these aND SEVERE DUTY WAGNER PADS AND IT stops fast. surprised the hell outa me. saying that i live in the rust belt. rotors rust where the pads ride on the unpainted part. aint nobody gonna fix dat!. and rotors rust here then it cracks ceramic pads, my rotors neeed changed before my pads are shot. so i went this route and im way better and half price. Im gonna stick with wagner severe duties until they screw around and change something.
customer_reviews.author: Vern Diesel

customer_reviews.title: Awesome deal!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these rather than turning my old ones and I'm glad I did! Wow, these bolted right on to my 04 chevy 1500 and run smooth right out of the box! Amazon sold these as used because the box had damage. I purchased 2 of these for less than 1 cheaper brand at the local parts store!
customer_reviews.author: Bishop

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Wagner brake products are always good quality, It's the only brand that I use.
customer_reviews.author: Ramios

customer_reviews.title: Very high quality brake rotor
customer_reviews.text: Installed with Wagner Thermo-Quiet brake pads on the front of my 2003 Chevy Suburban 1500..The quality of this brake rotor is impressive. It has a black paint-like coating on every surface except the pad bearing surfaces to help prevent corrosion. Absolutely fit like a glove and zero pedal pulsation after install, Torqued my wheel lug nuts to the GM recommended 140 ft. lbs.each, using a torque wrench. This helps prevent rotor warpage, and also helps ensure you can get your wheel off in case of a flat tire!
customer_reviews.author: Scott Burns

customer_reviews.title: They're nice quality, worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I use them on my 03 GMC safari AWD. Works and fits. They're nice quality, worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: DiegoGar

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Quality!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my 2004 Chevy Silverado 1500 4x4 and was very impressed. Fit and quality were awesome!! I also bought the rears. Same amazing quality, but watch the thickness. I have single piston calipers in the rear and these rotors wouldn't fit between the caliper bracket.
customer_reviews.author: shane wilburn

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit and seems to be nice quality. E coat is nice to prevent the rust
customer_reviews.author: ZROCK2003

customer_reviews.title: Could use better quality control
customer_reviews.text: Kind of wish I had paid the extra and purchased the AC Delco Professional series instead. Not quite true out of the box, could use a turning.
customer_reviews.author: The good, the bad and the ugly

customer_reviews.title: Fit was correct.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived as promised and fit was correct. Haven't had it long enough to speak to wear.
customer_reviews.author: goodinta

customer_reviews.title: Great, quality rotor
customer_reviews.text: Installed these rotors on my 2006 Acura RL. The old ones were squeaking like crazy. Perfect fit, braking is excellent and best of all, perfectly silent. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Brown

customer_reviews.title: Useful
customer_reviews.text: Wish I had more use out of them before that vehicle died.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne Siegwarth

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent rotors, much improved braking over the original rotors plus the coating keeps the rust off
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Roberson

customer_reviews.title: OEM quality
customer_reviews.text: Work great. Warehouse deals to the rescue again saving me $80 each.
customer_reviews.author: Nichole

customer_reviews.title: oem is best
customer_reviews.text: I like the fact that they e coated, they already warped you get what you pay for better off with OEM

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: So far so good, no problems or issues since the install, great product and price.

customer_reviews.title: Super nice rotor
customer_reviews.text: Great replacement rotor. I highly recommend. I like the black painted surface - protects from rust.
customer_reviews.author: Rion

customer_reviews.title: Work well on my 2003 Escalade EXT
customer_reviews.text: Used these on my 2003 Escalade EXT. Fit perfectly and work well.

customer_reviews.title: I recommend this product  very highly
customer_reviews.text: So far so good after one month..... no shaking, no bouncing

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: nice item the Ecoat is a good feature, will retard the expected rust from the salty roads
customer_reviews.author: Alan Pearson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The part worked excellent I will order again if I had to...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... the same day along with brake pads as they recommend they ride smooth with no
customer_reviews.text: Replaced mine the same day along with brake pads as they recommend they ride smooth with no noise
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Build quality is nice!
customer_reviews.text: These look awesome (like ACDelco factory pros). I've only had them on the truck for a month. We'll see if they endure the test of time
customer_reviews.author: WheelerFam

customer_reviews.title: Already started to shake the whole car they're already Warped
customer_reviews.text: Already started to shake the whole car they're already Warped
customer_reviews.author: E&M

customer_reviews.title: ... later warped up and made my brakes make the worse grinding noise
customer_reviews.text: Rotors okay for 6 months then later warped up and made my brakes make the worse grinding noise. The noise lead me to replacing my calibers and pads before I found the true problem. Do yourself a favor and buy a better quality rotor.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: These were not the correct rotors for the 2016 malibu. I returned them, and could not complete the repairs.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Mski

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Very nice quality. I was surprised when I opened the box the quality was great. And fit our suburban and are very smooth and quiet. Love them would 100% buy again.
customer_reviews.author: tiffany

product_meta.title: Wagner BD125654E Premium E-Coated Brake Rotor, Front
product_meta.description: Wagner Brake rotors with E-Shield coating feature an exclusive protective coating to all non-braking surfaces to prevent corrosion. These premium application-specific rotors with patented vane designs are validated by Wagner Brake engineers.
feature_bullets: ENGINEERED FOR PERFORMANCE -- OE-specific vane design provides effective braking power and heat dissipation while controlling noise, vibration and harshness
PREMIUM PROTECTION -- E-Shield protective coating is applied to non-braking surfaces to inhibit corrosion
TURNED AND SMOOTH FINISH -- Requires less pad break-in time and aids in proper bedding
EASY INSTALLATION -- Rotors are packaged in a Vapor Corrosion Inhibitor bag, eliminating the need for an oil coating which reduces prep time
PROPER BALANCE -- Spin balanced and cut to limit vibration for improving stability and control
PERFECT PAIRING -- Pair Wagner premium rotors with premium brake pads for optimal performance

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars98 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
